text: Do you know who the muderer is?

answers.de: Ich wünschte, ich könnte dir helfen
answers.nl: Ik wou dat ik je kon helpen

text: Do you know how she was murdered?

answers.en: I hear he put her in the blender
Someone told me he beat her with a broom
I heard he replaced their cleaning spray with flammable liquid
Didn't he tickle her to death with a feather duster?
I think he strangled her with the hoover
I hear he left the cooker gas on and she blew up
Someone told me he chopped her up and put her in the recycling
Didn't he use a toilet brush?
I heard he hid explosives in the washing machine
